title: How do I join PAXIV?
description: Join PAXIV for free-no card required-by selecting “Create Account” or “Get Started For Free”.

title: Who is allowed within PAXIV?
description: PAXIV BETA is our early-access trial phase where members can explore our platform for free and provide feedback to help refine the experience. During this period, you'll access all of PAXIV's tools, resources, and exclusive network benefits.

title: How much does PAXIV cost?
description: PAXIV BETA is our early-access trial phase where members can explore our platform for free and provide feedback to help refine the experience. During this period, you'll access all of PAXIV's tools, resources, and exclusive network benefits.
